attributes.additional_details: Save the closure of Liverpool swimming pools and the lifestyles childrens free swimming programme,we pay council tax and now they are taking away the one thing kids rely on in Liverpool , somewhere to go and something to do, also the government keep going on about keeping kids healthy and yet are trying to close the free gym and swimming they currently offer to all Liverpool schoolchildren, please reconsider this as it is more than unfair and is wrong.

rejection.details: This is the decision of the local council.
